data.text:
It was a calm day in the early summer, 
shortly after a big race.
data.processed:
󠁿It was a calm day in the early summer, 
󠁿shortly after a big race.

data.text: A break, is it?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿A break, is it?

data.text:
――I see, this is a plan with my well-being in mind. Then this 
Yaeno Muteki will pour her body and soul in to taking a break!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿――I see, this is a plan with my well-being in mind. Then this 
󠁿Yaeno Muteki will pour her body and soul in to taking a break!

data.text:
It was only for a few days and classes were currently 
low intensity, so I wanted her to spread her wings a 
little bit. That was my reasoning behind the break.
data.processed:
󠁿It was only for a few days and classes were currently 
󠁿low intensity, so I wanted her to spread her wings a 
󠁿little bit. That was my reasoning behind the break.

data.text:
The next day after school. 
I was passing by the training course on my way back――
data.processed:
󠁿The next day after school. 
󠁿I was passing by the training course on my way back――

data.text: ……Huuu. It was a worthwhile training session.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿……Huuu. It was a worthwhile training session.

data.text: Ah! This is, well, how should I put it……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Ah! This is, well, how should I put it……!

data.text:
I apologize, I understand I'm supposed to be taking a break! 
But I just can't calm down unless I'm doing some training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I apologize, I understand I'm supposed to be taking a break! 
󠁿But I just can't calm down unless I'm doing some training.

data.text:
……Yaeno Muteki's straightforwardness was part of her charm 
and her strength. But I really want her to take a break now!

choices.text: Anyways, no training during this break!

data.processed:
󠁿……Yaeno Muteki's straightforwardness was part of her charm 
󠁿and her strength. But I really want her to take a break now!

data.text:
Haa……! I apologize for worrying you. 
I'm ashamed of my own immaturity……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Haa……! I apologize for worrying you. 
󠁿I'm ashamed of my own immaturity……!

data.text:
……Going forward, I will definitely keep this mistake in mind. 
I will immediately get changed and return to my dorm……I'm sorry.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……Going forward, I will definitely keep this mistake in mind. 
󠁿I will immediately get changed and return to my dorm……I'm sorry.

data.text:
And that was how we parted that day…… 
But could Yaeno Muteki really put her 『Training on Hold』?
data.processed:
󠁿And that was how we parted that day…… 
󠁿But could Yaeno Muteki really put her 『Training on Hold』?

data.text: And then on the second day of Yaeno Muteki's break.
data.processed: 󠁿And then on the second day of Yaeno Muteki's break.

data.text: She's not here――
data.processed: 󠁿She's not here――

data.text: She's not here either――
data.processed: 󠁿She's not here either――

data.text: And she isn't here either.
data.processed: 󠁿And she isn't here either.

data.text:
After what happened yesterday, I looked around the multiple training 
spaces around campus……Yaeno Muteki was nowhere to be found.
data.processed:
󠁿After what happened yesterday, I looked around the multiple training 
󠁿spaces around campus……Yaeno Muteki was nowhere to be found.

data.text:
Maybe she's staying in the dorms or out with her friends. If she 
was resting, I figured I should head in to town and do some shopping!
data.processed:
󠁿Maybe she's staying in the dorms or out with her friends. If she 
󠁿was resting, I figured I should head in to town and do some shopping!

data.text:
On the way home, I decided to take a small detour. 
This was a place filled with memories. That day――
data.processed:
󠁿On the way home, I decided to take a small detour. 
󠁿This was a place filled with memories. That day――

data.text:
Suuu――………… 
Fuuー…………。
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
――Fuu! ……Haaa! 
……Seii! ……Taaa!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿――Fuu! ……Haaa! 
󠁿……Seii! ……Taaa!

data.text:
Right, even back then, she was alone, devoting 
herself to training. Her graceful movements were 
proof of that training. That was how I felt――
data.processed:
󠁿Right, even back then, she was alone, devoting 
󠁿herself to training. Her graceful movements were 
󠁿proof of that training. That was how I felt――

data.text:
Right, just like that, Yaeno Muteki 
was devoting herself to training――
data.processed:
󠁿Right, just like that, Yaeno Muteki 
󠁿was devoting herself to training――

data.text: ……Ah.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Wha-……what a coincidence, huh? 
Were you also taking a walk?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: You were training just now, weren't you?
choices.processed: <size=40>You were training just now, weren't you?</size>

choices.text: You were training just now, weren't you?
choices.processed: <size=40>You were training just now, weren't you?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Wha-……what a coincidence, huh? 
󠁿Were you also taking a walk?

data.text: ……Yes I was……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿……Yes I was……!

data.text:
In order to comply with your instructions, I left 
the school, with all of its training facilities, 
and that went well in the beginning but……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿In order to comply with your instructions, I left 
󠁿the school, with all of its training facilities, 
󠁿and that went well in the beginning but……

data.text:
As soon as I saw this underpass, I was filled with 
a sudden sense of nostalgia and motiviation…… 
There's no excuse. My shamelessness knows no bounds!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿As soon as I saw this underpass, I was filled with 
󠁿a sudden sense of nostalgia and motiviation…… 
󠁿There's no excuse. My shamelessness knows no bounds!

data.text:
This is a bit difficult to handle on my own…… 
How should I put it? I panicked, since I felt 
that if I had free time I should train……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿This is a bit difficult to handle on my own…… 
󠁿How should I put it? I panicked, since I felt 
󠁿that if I had free time I should train……

data.text:
Was it because she couldn't train to her satisfaction 
or because she struggled with taking breaks? Maybe both?――
She hung her head in dejection.
data.processed:
󠁿Was it because she couldn't train to her satisfaction 
󠁿or because she struggled with taking breaks? Maybe both?――
󠁿She hung her head in dejection.

data.text:
B-but Trainer-dono, you felt there was 
significance in me taking a break……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: I wasn't trying to completely stop you……
choices.processed: <size=40>I wasn't trying to completely stop you……</size>

data.processed:
󠁿B-but Trainer-dono, you felt there was 
󠁿significance in me taking a break……

data.text:
……! Ossu! 
Then I shall continue my current training!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……! Ossu! 
󠁿Then I shall continue my current training!

data.text:
In the end, she continued training until sunset. It seemed like 
having Yaeno Muteki get some rest would be a difficult task……!
data.processed:
󠁿In the end, she continued training until sunset. It seemed like 
󠁿having Yaeno Muteki get some rest would be a difficult task……!
